Text: Thanks man, I've been looking for them in this resolution, also, you might want to update the torrent and add the Cinematic Intro :).
Never mind my last comment, is the Return trailer the Cinematic one? or the mash up from the previous ones shown at E3 11?

The return trailer is the cinematic trailer shown at
e3 2011

Good upload thanks for taking the time. Great quality in both WMV and MOV 10/10.
My only issue is big "Intro Cinematic" watermark in the top righthand corner of the Return clip.  I know its not you fault but good to point out for those using the footage to mash up.
Thanks
